net.jhoogland.jautomata.io

Class AcceptorIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.io.AcceptorIO

  • public class AcceptorIO
extends Object
    This class contains static methods to read and write (weighted) acceptors.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland

      • read

        public static <L,K> Automaton<L,K> read(Reader reader,
                        Semiring<K> semiring,
                        Format<L> labelFormat)
                           throws IOException
        Creates and returns an automaton from the specified reader. The semiring and label format are specified by the arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        public static <K> Automaton<Character,K> read(Reader reader,
                              Semiring<K> semiring)
                                   throws IOException
        Creates and returns an automaton from the specified reader. The semiring is specified by the argument. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as label format.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readUnweighted

        public static <L> Automaton<L,Boolean> readUnweighted(Reader reader,
                                      Format<L> labelFormat)
                                           throws IOException
        Creates and returns an unweighted automaton from the specified reader. The label format is specified by the argument.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readUnweighted

        public static Automaton<Character,Boolean> readUnweighted(Reader reader)
                                                   throws IOException
        Creates and returns an unweighted automaton from the specified reader. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as label format.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readWeighted

        public static <L> Automaton<L,Double> readWeighted(Reader reader,
                                   Format<L> labelFormat)
                                        throws IOException
        Creates and returns a weighted automaton over the real semiring from the specified reader. The label format is specified by the argument.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readWeighted

        public static Automaton<Character,Double> readWeighted(Reader reader)
                                                throws IOException
        Creates and returns a weighted automaton over the real semiring from the specified reader. An instance of CharacterFormat is used as label format.
        Throws:
        IOException
